data.actual_result: The modal is off-center and all the way to the right and half the page is darkened
data.short_description: [Chrome 70 Specific] When deleting an application in the developer portal, the modal is off-center
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the developer portal - Select an app to delete - Observe the verification modal being off-center (The modal about writing the app's name + 2FA code)
